preConditions.sqlCheck: SELECT count(*) FROM global_property WHERE property = "obs.complex_obs_dir";

changeSet.comment: Update value for obs.complex_obs_dir global property

changeSet.author: Tarun

preConditions.sqlCheck: select count(*) from global_property gp where property = 'patient.nameValidationRegex';

changeSet.comment: Updating global property to accept apostophie in Names field in registartion page
changeSet.sql: update global_property set property_value = "^[a-zA-Z'_ ]{1,50}$.*$" where property = 'patient.nameValidationRegex';

changeSet.author: Bindu
changeSet.comment: Add Reset Appointment Status privilege to role Appointments:ManageAppointments
changeSet.sql: INSERT IGNORE INTO role_privilege (role, privilege) SELECT * FROM (SELECT 'Clinical-App-Common', 'Get Order Sets') AS tmp WHERE EXISTS ( SELECT role FROM role WHERE role = 'Clinical-App-Common' ); INSERT IGNORE INTO role_privilege (role, privilege) SELECT * FROM (SELECT 'Registration-App', 'Delete Visits') AS tmp WHERE EXISTS ( SELECT role FROM role WHERE role = 'Registration-App' );

changeSet.author: Supriya

preConditions.sqlCheck: select count(*) from global_property gp where property = 'patient.nameValidationRegex';

changeSet.comment: Updating global property to accept hyphen in Names field in registartion page
changeSet.sql: update global_property set property_value = "^[-a-zA-Z'_ ]{1,50}$.*$" where property = 'patient.nameValidationRegex';

changeSet.sql: DROP PROCEDURE IF EXISTS add_new_drug;

changeSet.author: Kiruthiga

preConditions.sqlCheck: select count(*) from concept_name where name IN ("Drug-Drug Interaction", "Adverse effect", "Out of stock") AND concept_name_type = "FULLY_SPECIFIED";

changeSet.comment: Adding Answer Concept for Stopped Order Reason

changeSet.author: Kiruthiga

preConditions.sqlCheck: select count(*) from concept_answer ca join concept_name cn on ca.concept_id = cn.concept_id where ca.answer_concept IN (select concept_id from concept_name where name IN ("Drug-Drug Interaction", "Adverse effect", "Out of stock","Others") AND concept_name_type = "FULLY_SPECIFIED") AND cn.concept_id IN (select concept_id from concept_name where name = "Stopped Order Reason");

changeSet.comment: Adding New answer concept to Stopped Order Reason

changeSet.author: Kiruthiga

preConditions.sqlCheck: select count(*) from concept_set cs join concept_name cn on cs.concept_id=cn.concept_id where cs.concept_id in (select concept_id from concept_name where name IN ('tablet(s)','capsule(s)','ml','mg','IU','Unit(s)') AND concept_name_type = "FULLY_SPECIFIED") AND cs.concept_set IN (select concept_id from concept_name where name = "Drug Routes");

changeSet.comment: Removing the mappings of tablet(s), capsule(s), ml,mg,IU,Unit(s) from drug routes
